Atomic Errors¶

There are several errors that may be raised when using the Dalton package.

exception dalton.tools.atomic_errors.AssetIDError(asset_id)¶

Exception called when Asset ID is invalid

exception dalton.tools.atomic_errors.NoCollectionImageError¶

Exception called when a collection has no image

exception dalton.tools.atomic_errors.NoFiltersError¶

Exception called when no filters are provided

exception dalton.tools.atomic_errors.RequestFailedError¶

Exception called when an API request fails
